seller_notes: All cameras tested and functional unless noted. Prices negotiable for bundle deals.

items.name: Pentax K1000
items.condition_notes: Light brassing on edges. Meter accurate. All speeds fire correctly. Foam replaced.

items.name: Canon AE-1 Program
items.condition_notes: Classic squeak on shutter (common, cosmetic only). Clean viewfinder. No fungus.

items.name: Olympus OM-1
items.condition_notes: Some paint wear on bottom plate. Prism has slight yellowing but doesn't affect photos. All mechanical - no battery needed for shutter.

items.name: Nikon FM2
items.condition_notes: Titanium shutter. 1/4000s works perfectly. Basically mint aside from tiny mark on baseplate.

items.name: Minolta X-700
items.condition_notes: Program mode and aperture priority both work. Recently had capacitor replaced. Clean optics.

items.name: Yashica Mat 124G
items.condition_notes: Taking lens clean, viewing lens has light haze (doesn't affect photos). Focus smooth. Meter untested.

items.name: Leica M3
items.condition_notes: Body only - no lens. Rangefinder patch slightly dim but usable. Shutter speeds accurate. Some brassing. This is a user, not a collector piece.

items.name: Polaroid SX-70
items.condition_notes: Chrome and leather version. Folds flat. Tested with 600 film + ND filter. Some scuffing on leather.

items.name: Contax T2
items.condition_notes: LCD works. AF accurate. Titanium body in great shape. The hype is real - this is a fantastic point and shoot.

items.name: Hasselblad 500C/M
items.condition_notes: A12 back included. Mirror damper replaced. Lens has very faint cleaning marks visible only under bright light. Waist-level finder.
